trans-unit.source: This class is intended for use by the infrastructure.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement"></xref> class using the specified target and issuer of the policy, the policy parameters, privacy notice location, and the privacy notice version.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement"> </xref> 클래스 지정 된 대상 및 정책, 정책 매개 변수, 개인 정보 알림 위치 및 개인 정보 알림 버전의 발급자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the target of this policy.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.Target*> property.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the policy issuer.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.Issuer*> property.
A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the parameters for this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> 이 요소에 대 한 매개 변수를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.Parameters*> property.
The <xref:System.Uri> where the privacy policy is located.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.PolicyNoticeLink*> property.
The version of the privacy information.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.PolicyNoticeVersion*> property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the issuer is managed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>발급자; 관리 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.IsManagedIssuer*> property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the issuer of the policy is a managed issuer.
trans-unit.target: 정책의 발급자는 관리 되는 발급자 인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the issuer is managed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>발급자; 관리 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy issuer.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the policy issuer.
Gets a collection of XML elements that represent the parameters for this element.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소에 대 한 매개 변수를 나타내는 XML 요소의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the parameters for this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> 이 요소에 대 한 매개 변수를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI for the privacy information of this policy.
trans-unit.target: 이 정책의 개인 정보 취급 방침에 대 한 URI를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> where the privacy policy is located.
Gets or sets the version of the privacy information.
trans-unit.target: 개인 정보 취급 방침의 버전을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The version of the privacy information.
Gets or sets the target of this policy.
trans-unit.target: 이 정책의 대상을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the target of this policy.
